name: expropriator
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person or organization that takes away money or property, especially for public use with little or no payment to the owner, or for personal use illegally: The property was taken from its owner by the expropriator. He exposed today not as a creator of wealth but as an expropriator. See
expropriate
More examplesFewer examplesGiven the right political atmosphere, any of these nations could become the next expropriator.Landowners can appeal if they're not happy with how much the expropriator pays them.A private property expropriator like the government will never function in complementary ways with the economics of private property.
